医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
青年和中年饮食质量与晚年更好的大脑健康有关一项研究的最新初步结果显示，在青年和中年时吃高质量的饮食有助于在老年时保持大脑的良好运作，该研究使用了近七年跟踪的 3,000 多人收集的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Youth-and-midlife-diet-quality-linked-to-better-brain-health-in-later-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Youth-and-midlife-diet-quality-linked-to-better-brain-health-in-later-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=490aa7b9-4201-42ba-9df8-638b3603854e Mon, 01 Jul 2024 22:25:50 -0400 Youth and midlife diet quality linked to better brain health in later years
新的光激活方法精确靶向癌症和炎症细胞伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校的研究人员报告说，一种利用光精确定位麻烦细胞使其死亡的新方法可以解锁对癌症和炎症性疾病的新认识和治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/New-light-activated-method-targets-cancer-and-itis-cells-with- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/New-light-activated-method-targets-cancer-and-itis-cells-with- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92486235-5d73-4598-9c21-bb51229cadf3 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 21:21:49 -0400 New light-activated method targets cancer and inflammatory cells with precision
新技术可以可视化体外受精获得的胚胎的新陈代谢加泰罗尼亚生物工程研究所（IBEC）“生殖健康生物工程”团队开发的一项新技术能够可视化通过体外受精获得的胚胎的新陈代谢，从而确定哪些最有可能在子宫中正确植入并达到足月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/New-technology-can-visualize-the-metabolism-of-embryos-obtained-through-in-vitro-pregnation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/New-technology-can-visualize-the-metabolism-of-embryos-obtained-through-in-vitro-pregnation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb684382-4be0-4c38-b943-2ddd6f41f179 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 21:17:40 -0400 New technology can visualize the metabolism of embryos obtained through in vitro fertilization
通过分子分析早期检测侵袭性多发性骨髓瘤多发性骨髓瘤是骨髓中免疫细胞最常见的癌症之一。它被认为是无法治愈的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Early-detection-of-aggressive-multiple-myeloma-through-molecular-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Early-detection-of-aggressive-multiple-myeloma-through-molecular-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e6f02d4-fc55-4b4d-9545-ceb9143548fd Mon, 01 Jul 2024 20:52:28 -0400 Early detection of aggressive multiple myeloma through molecular analysis
突破性假肢通过神经控制实现自然步态最先进的假肢可以帮助截肢者实现自然的行走步态，但它们无法让用户对肢体进行完全的神经控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Breakthrough-prosthetic-leg-achieves-natural-gait-through-neural-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Breakthrough-prosthetic-leg-achieves-natural-gait-through-neural-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29798536-7d67-4992-b052-4ae1f36a1137 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 20:44:12 -0400 Breakthrough prosthetic leg achieves natural gait through neural control
研究揭示了病态肥胖患者假体周围关节感染的实验室预测因素《骨与关节外科杂志》上的一项研究报告称，对于接受膝关节或髋关节置换术的严重肥胖患者，通常获得的实验室值（包括贫血和炎症标志物）是假体周围感染 (PJI) 风险的独立预测因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-reveals-laboratory-predictors-of-periprosthetic-joint-infection-in-morbidly-obese-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-reveals-laboratory-predictors-of-periprosthetic-joint-infection-in-morbidly-obese-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fde3b23-b433-4e62-b81d-ef5442c3f339 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 20:38:33 -0400 Study reveals laboratory predictors of periprosthetic joint infection in morbidly obese patients
研究显示，接触二手烟会使非吸烟者患乳腺癌的风险增加 24%接触二手烟会使不吸烟女性患乳腺癌的风险增加 24%，这凸显了对无烟环境的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Exposure-to-second-hand-smoke-raises-breast-cancer-risk-in-non-smokers-by-2425-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Exposure-to-second-hand-smoke-raises-breast-cancer-risk-in-non-smokers-by-2425-study-reveals.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7457098-66d2-4862-a5fa-b9234efff096 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 20:38:00 -0400 Exposure to second-hand smoke raises breast cancer risk in non-smokers by 24%, study reveals
NIH 启动创新鼻部 COVID-19 疫苗的一期试验一项第一阶段试验测试了一种实验性鼻腔疫苗的安全性，该疫苗可能会针对 SARS-CoV-2（引起 COVID-19 的病毒）的新变种​​提供更广泛的保护，目前正在美国的三个地点招募健康成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/NIH-launches-Phase-1-trial-for-innovative-nasal-COVID-19-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/NIH-launches-Phase-1-trial-for-innovative-nasal-COVID-19-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff08185a-3873-4b3d-9618-40c9694e4ec1 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 20:01:36 -0400 NIH launches Phase 1 trial for innovative nasal COVID-19 vaccine
新研究表明，碾磨和烘焙可降低小麦粉的营养水平全麦有什么是精制面粉所缺乏的？一项新的研究揭示了营养素含量的关键差异以及营养素流失的确切位置；有时会获得-；沿着从农场到餐桌的旅程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Milling-and-baking-slash- Nutrition-levels-in-wheat-flour-new-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Milling-and-baking-slash- Nutrition-levels-in-wheat-flour-new-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65f38bef-ec59-4e01-83ce-9482c2c0d4a1 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 19:58:23 -0400 Milling and baking slash nutrient levels in wheat flour, new research shows
医学定制膳食有望降低医疗成本根据针对美国各州的最新研究，为患有糖尿病和心脏病等饮食敏感疾病以及日常活动能力有限的人们提供医学定制膳食 (MTM) 的计划可能会大幅节省医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Mediically-tailored-meals-show-promise-for-reducing-healthcare-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Mediically-tailored-meals-show-promise-for-reducing-healthcare-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3c21359-330b-46b0-9ce6-878a14318f84 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 19:55:54 -0400 Medically tailored meals show promise for reducing healthcare costs
